title: CSE Sem 6 Electives
content: Which electives are easy to score in cybersec specialisation?

comments.body:
If blockchain is offered then it is extremely easy E3. 

Information Security is the easiest elective overall so that's the best E4

Bullllllshit ðŸ˜­
Information Security is one of the worst ... Nobody has ever gotten an S ... It's pure shit .. if you're looking to take a subject for marks, DON'T take IS. They'll suck the living fuck out of you in lab assignments and exams are also crazy hard.

I hope this a troll. 69 of us got S grade and 68 of us got A. Average final ISA marks was 42/50.

[Proof.](https://imgur.com/a/HH4RHkL)

The Lab assignments are a joy to do. If u dislike IS then you'll hate them.
